SELECT p.id AS productId, p.open_id, t.money, t.create_time AS createTime, p.title AS productTitle, count( t.id ) AS sellerCount FROM tb_product p LEFT JOIN tb_trade t ON p.id = t.product_id WHERE p.open_id = #{openId} AND ( t.trade_type = 0 OR t.create_time IS NULL ) GROUP BY p.id ORDER BY p.id DESC;
